sense.def:
Kadar položaj
unfolds
, se razvija in postaja ljudem vse bolj znan in razumljiv.

seg.quote: The great invasion plan was beginning to unfold.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
unfolds one's plans or intentions
, nekomu pove, kakšne načrte ali namere ima.

Kadar nekdo
unfolds something
, nekaj, kar je bilo zloženo, razprostre, tako da postane ravno.

seg.quote: She thrust a small piece of paper at me. I unfolded it.
